task.summary: Default task

Now bootstrap.js files are added, next thing to do is to add a button to the toolbar. That Hides/reveals the toolbar.
Also, simple ip logging is added, which is extracted from the http header (and not from the TCP/IP connection - AFAIK).
Added a bit updated TODO.
Adding asset files.
need to put 2 attributes into the navbar button but I don't know how, need to figure it out

need to put 2 attributes into the navbar button but I don't know how, need to figure it out
adding this as todo ^

The navbar hiding/showing button works just fine.
We have reached the bootstrap nirvana. Time to go on to the next level !

Going towards a third Page:
1) Print all notes ordered by their content.
2) CRUD a Note.
3) Note is = class Note(content:String)
This is saved to the "database."
